alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:18AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Searcy, southern Newton, northeastern Johnson and north central Pope Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 617 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walnut, or 15 miles southwest of Jasper, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillen... Moore... Walnut... Bertha... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Ben Hur... Wayton... Salus... Fort Douglas... Crossroad... Swain... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Deer... Treat... Cowell... Nail... Sand Gap... Lurton... Simpson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations
